title.rendered: FiNews Asia Reports: Real Estate Veteran to Head Multifamily Office in Singapore

excerpt.rendered: Priyaranjan Kumar will lead Avarium’s new Singapore office, which will be a regional hub that complements its Hong Kong operations.
